mapper.select: SELECT A.MNG_ID ,A.BZCD ,A.REQ_DSCD ,A.REQ_DT ,B.EMPNM AS REQPE_NM ,A.REQ_TXT ,A.PRC_DT ,C.EMPNM AS PRCPE_NM ,C.EMPNO AS PRCPE_NO ,A.PRC_TXT ,A.REQ_PRC_STEP_CD ,A.ATFL_MNG_ID ,D.ORG_FILE_NM FROM pms_rq_mng A LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_emp_info B ON B.EMPNO = A.REQPE_NO AND B.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND B.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_emp_info C ON C.EMPNO = A.PRCPE_NO AND C.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND C.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_atfl_mng D ON D.SQNO = 1 AND D.FILE_RGS_DSCD = '500' AND D.ATFL_MNG_ID = A.ATFL_MNG_ID AND D.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND D.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.MNG_ID = #{mng_id} AND A.BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}
